other: The script runs a Python program named main.py, which is located in the directory two levels above the script's location. It uses a YAML configuration file named experiments_polaris.yaml.
The script utilizes a custom shell script called set_affinity_gpu_polaris.sh.
The script employs a spack environment named polaris, located at /home/tbouvier/git/spack-envs/polaris.
The script requires access to a dataset named ImageNet_blurred, located at /grand/VeloC/tbouvier/datasets/ImageNet_blurred, which is copied to the local scratch filesystem during execution.
